humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the patient has breast cancer with a bifocal invasive ductal carcinoma (G II; tumor diameter: 3.0 cm and 0.8 cm) and focal intraductal components. The tumor classification is NOS, G II, pT2(m) pN1a(1/18)LOV0R0. The 'pN1a(1/18)' indicates that there is metastases in 1 out of 18 assessed lymph nodes. Based on the new rules provided, this corresponds to N1 stage, as per Rule 12: N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes (No/Total).

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The 'pN1a(1/18)LOV0R0' portion of the diagnosis indicates that there is metastasis in 1 out of 18 axillary lymph nodes (LOV0) and no additional nodal involvement (R0). This corresponds to N1 stage.
